saveGame(GamePanel) - Method in class Client
this method will send "2" to server to say client wants to save an unfinished game!

this method gets a user and writes it on it's file.

this method receives a user and adds it to the rankings of the game.
saveScore(int) - Method in class Client
this method is called when a client loose or win a game , and send "4" to server so that server will update its file
sendUserToServer() - Method in class Client
this method sends 0 to server so that server understands client wants to be saved and end its connection
